author: Okogba
title: Ghana heralds Toke Makinwa’s ‘On becoming’
text:
Home » Entertainment » Ghana heralds Toke Makinwa’s ‘On becoming’ Ghana heralds Toke Makinwa’s ‘On becoming’ On 8:04 pm In Entertainment by Okogba Comments 
What seems an unbecomingly phenomenon presented in a work of art (book), extensively discussed within celebrity circle and making much buzz has apparently toed towards ‘on becoming’ in reality as cynosural Toke Makinwa charted a new course with ‘a book on wheels’ of her bestselling and much talked about memoir ‘On Becoming’ with an African tour. Jackie Appiah, Toke Makinwa, Ama Abebrese & Ahuofe Patri 
In spite of lawsuit threat from her estranged husband, undefiant Toke Makinwa kicked off the African tour to promote her memoir “On Becoming” with the first port of call, Accra, Ghana as top Ghallywood stars welcomes the author. They include Jackie Appiah, Ama Abebrese Victoria Lebene, Ahuofe Patri and Vanessa Gyan, all who trooped out in support of the Nigerian sweetheart at the book reading and signing event held on Friday February 3, at La Palm Beach Hotel, Accra. 
Makinwa in her remark disclosed that Accra tour was the first leg of her African tour to be followed by Kenya and others. Okogba
